data.text: Hwɛ, ɔhene bi bɛba abɛdi ɔhene wɔ tenenee mu
Wɔn mu biara bɛyɛ te sɛ mframa ano hintabea
Wɔn a wɔwɔ ani no bɛhunu nokorɛ no,
Deɛ ɔyɛ adwene mu herɛ bɛhunu na wate aseɛ,
Wɔremfrɛ ɔkwasea sɛ onimuonyamfoɔ bio
Ɔkwasea ka nkwaseasɛm
Ɔpapahwekwaa akwan yɛ amumuyɛ,
Nanso, onimuonyamfoɔ yɛ nhyehyɛeɛ a ɛho wɔ nyam
Mo mmaa a mogye mo ho die,
Afe akyi nna kakra bi no
Mo ho mpopo mo mmaa a mogye mo ho die;
Momfa awerɛhoɔ mfa mo nsa mmoro mo koko so wɔ mfuo fɛfɛ
Ɛfiri sɛ nkasɛɛ ne nnɛnkyɛnse agye afa mo asase afa.
Wɔbɛgya aban no hɔ,
kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛhwie Honhom no afiri ɔsoro agu yɛn so,
Tenenee bɛtena anweatam so
Adeteneneeyɛ bɛso asomdwoeɛ aba;
Me nkurɔfoɔ bɛtenatena mmeaeɛ a asomdwoeɛ wɔ,
Mpo sɛ ampariboɔ sɛe kwaeɛ no
wɔbɛhyira wo,
